name: Traumerin
description: Run and battle through 20 levels with 4 unique worlds, plenty of enemies and a mother that need's to be saved in Traumerin a platforming, RPG experience hearkening back to the days when the gameboy roamed the earth, an ode to the games of yesteryear with a few twists. Finding yourself in a strange and distant land, your only companion being your faithful stuffed bear. It's your job to get your mother back from the grips of the deadly harvesters and find out the truth of this strange world.
